about.title: About La Cueva
about.heroParagraph: From the heart of the Dead Sea, one of the world's most unique destinations, La Cueva Aqua Park was born as more than a traditional water park — it was created as a fully immersive experience.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: La Cueva Aqua Park is a fully integrated water park located in South Shouna – Dead Sea. It spans approximately 30 dunums and features a wide range of water attractions, pools, and dedicated kids' areas.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: La Cueva Aqua Park is a leading water entertainment destination in Jordan, developed with a modern vision focused on experience quality, operational efficiency, and diverse target segments.

concept.title: The Concept
concept.content: Conceptually, La Cueva is a complete world where water becomes motion, attractions turn into stories, and families experience joy together.

locationStrategy.title: Strategic Location
locationStrategy.content: Located at the Dead Sea, La Cueva enjoys strategic proximity to Amman, major resorts, and tourist attractions, ensuring steady visitor flow throughout the season.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be the leading family water park destination in Jordan.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Deliver a safe, enjoyable, and high-quality water entertainment experience.

safety.title: Technology & Safety
safety.intro: Because real fun is never complete without safety:

awards.title: Awards & Certifications
items: Awarded "Top Tourist Destination 2019" by the Jordanian Ministry of Tourism

brandPromise.title: Our Promise
brandPromise.content:
La Cueva is not just a destination — it's a feeling that stays with every visitor.
Every season, every visit — La Cueva promises an authentic experience unlike any other.

attractions.title: Attractions
attractions.intro: La Cueva offers a variety of water attractions categorized by thrill level to suit all visitors.
bullets: Water slides with varying thrill levels

waterSlides.title: Water Slides
waterSlides.desc: Multiple slides ranging from gentle family rides to extreme thrill slides for the adventurous.

wavePool.title: Wave Pool
wavePool.desc: An ocean-like wave pool with varying wave intensities, suitable for all ages.

lazyRiver.title: Lazy River
lazyRiver.desc: A peaceful river ride to relax and enjoy the surrounding views.

adrenalineTower.title: Adrenaline Tower
adrenalineTower.desc: The park's highest point offering a thrilling experience for adventure seekers.

familyPools.title: Family Pools
familyPools.desc: Pools of varying depths for the whole family with comfortable seating areas.

kidsAreaAttraction.title: Kids Area
kidsAreaAttraction.desc: A dedicated area with safe, colorful games for young children.

kidsArea.title: Kids Area
kidsArea.intro: A safe, child-friendly area featuring colorful water games, shallow pools, and continuous lifeguard supervision.

slides.title: Kids Slides
slides.desc: Specially designed slides with bright colors and safe heights for children.

safety.title: Safety Information
safety.desc: Your children's safety is our priority. All areas are monitored by trained lifeguards and surveillance cameras.

ageGuide.title: Age Guidelines
ageGuide.desc: Age-appropriate attractions with clear guidelines to ensure children's safety.

restaurants.desc: Restaurants serving a variety of fast food including pizza, burgers, and falafel.

cafes.title: Cafes
cafes.desc: Cafes offering hot and cold drinks with shisha in designated areas.

snacks.title: Snacks & Drinks
snacks.desc: Fresh juices, ice cream, and a variety of healthy beverages.

private.title: Private Events
private.desc: Book private events for companies, organizations, and social gatherings.

schools.title: Schools & Groups
schools.intro: La Cueva welcomes school trips and groups with tailored programs and special packages.

trips.title: School Trips
trips.desc: Special educational and recreational programs for schools with discounted rates and full supervision.

packages.title: Group Packages
packages.desc: Special packages for companies, clubs, associations, and universities.

tickets.title: Tickets & Pricing
tickets.intro: Full-day entry tickets granting access to all attractions, with prices varying by season.

adults.title: Adults
adults.desc: Adult ticket prices range from 15 to 25 JOD depending on the season, including access to all attractions and facilities.

kids.title: Children
kids.desc: Children under 2 years enter for free.

seniors.title: Seniors
seniors.desc: Seniors aged 65 and above enter for free.

notes.title: Important Notes
items: Outside food and drinks are not allowed.
The park is closed during winter.
Free life jackets available for all visitors.
Fish aquarium operates from 11 AM to 6 PM.
